21b5b1779d52da82b0a477fbf05b65d0.sentence: weakness are minor : the feel and layout of the remote control are only so-so ; it does n't show the complete filename of mp3s with really long name ; you must cycle through every zoom setting ( 2x , 3x , 4x , 1/2x , etc . ) before getting back to normal size [ sorry if i 'm just ignorant of a way to get back to 1x quickly ] .
